verbose_text: To this end, we treated extracts with the Cdc7 inhibitor PHA-767491 (Cdc7-i) to block replisome activation or Geminin to block replisome loading (XREF_FIG) and used plasmid pull-downs to monitor association of Top2alpha and other replisome proteins to DNA (XREF_FIG).
evidence: Cdc7 inhibitor PHA-767491 (Cdc7-i) to block replisome activation               or Geminin
